titleStmt.title: The spouses carriage in the wildernesse, in her leaning upon her welbeloved, opening the temper of the beleeving-soule in her severall wildernesses ... in a sermon formerly preacht in Andrewes Parish in Norwich, now reprinted, being corrected by the author / by John Collings ...
titleStmt.author: Collinges, John, 1623-1690.

notesStmt.note: Has special t.p. with imprint: London : Printed for Rich. Tomlins, 1649.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
